summary: The option to feed on corpses now only appears in sneak mode.
descriptionHtml:
The Ring of Namira can provide great benefits to cannibals, but it\'s really annoying to use because it opens the prompt to feed on every dead body. I\'ve just added a check so that the prompt only opens when in sneak mode. Now you can loot corpses while wearing the ring without getting that annoying prompt constantly. This was made for a request I received. I got that request two months ago, but better late than never, right?


[color=cyan][b]Install[/b][/color]
Unzip the file into your Data folder and activate then using whatever mod manager you use. My data folder is located in \"C:/Program Files x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/\" and I\'d imagine yours is something similar.
author: Kevin Kidder
